Parameters: The @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#model#CameraPosition_E@ at the end of the last camera change.
onCameraChange(com.google.android.gms.ma.Description: Called after the camera position has changed. During an animation, this listener may not be notified of intermediate camera positions. It is always called for the final position in the animation. This is called on the main thread.

ClassDesc: Defines signatures for methods that are called when the camera changes position.
